doc:
Timothy Bottoms https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Timothy_Bottoms 0 Timothy James Bottoms (born August 30, 1951) is an American actor and film producer. He is best known for his role as Sonny Crawford in The Last Picture Show where he and his fellow co-stars, Cybill Shepherd and Jeff Bridges, rose to fame; and for his role as James Hart, the first-year law student who battles with Prof. Kingsfield, in the film adaptation The Paper Chase. Timothy_James_Bottoms ( born August_30 , 1951 ) is an_American_actor_and_film_producer . He is_best_known for his_role as Sonny_Crawford in The_Last_Picture_Show where he and his_fellow_co-stars , Cybill_Shepherd and Jeff_Bridges , rose to fame ;_and for his_role as James_Hart , the_first-year_law_student who battles with Prof._Kingsfield , in the_film_adaptation The_Paper_Chase .
